ProjectTitle:
Diffracting the Choreographer: Shaping the Choreographer Position
in 21st Century European Contemporary Dance (SCP)
InitialFeedbackHistory:
28/03/2023
Please note that box and external hard drives are not very suitable for long term data preservation, have a look at the storage guide for alternatives: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en. Alternatively you can use a data repository such as RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) where you can also make your data available for others since you indicate that there are no factors restricting sharing, for more information: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
